Multispectral

CMatch

CIE standard color matching function types.

  • CIE31

CIE1931 2° observer.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE31. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • CIE31_J

CIE1931 observer with corrections by Judd.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE31_J. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • CIE31_JV

CIE1931 observer with corrections by Judd and Vos.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE31_JV. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • CIE64

CIE1964 10° observer.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE64. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • CIE12_2

CIE2012 2° observer (current CIE 2° standard observer).

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE12_2. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • CIE12_10

CIE2012 10° observer (current CIE 10° standard observer).

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for CIE12_10. Check Documenter's build log for details.

ConeFund

Cone fundamental function types.

  • LMS31

LMS function associated with the CIE1931 CMF.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for LMS31. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • LMS64

LMS function associated with the CIE1964 CMF. S cone function extended by the function $10^{10402.1 / λ - 21.27185}$ in the range between ? and ?, according to ?.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for LMS64. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • LMS06_2

LMS function associated with the new CIE2012 2° standard observer.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for LMS06_2. Check Documenter's build log for details.

  • LMS06_10

LMS function associated with the new CIE2012 10° standard observer.

Missing docstring.

Missing docstring for LMS06_10. Check Documenter's build log for details.

COpp

Color opponent spaces.

  • VYBRG

Ingling and Tsou color opponent space.
